I know excessive thirst can be a sign of diabetes, but I'mnot thirsty.  And I'm not taking any prescription meds other than Ambien, but the lip drynessstarted before I went on it.  And my lips are redder than normal.  I feel like maybe I have an allergy tosomething, but I have no idea what, and I don't wear the same lipstick every day.
